summary: When Sunder loses everything, he seeks refuge in a graveyard, where he befriends a ghost.
cast: Naseeruddin Shah|Shah Rukh Khan|Urmila Matondkar|Malvika Tiwari|Shammi Kapoor|Deven Verma|Tinnu Anand|Anjana Mumtaz|Anjan Srivastav|Rakesh Bedi|Johnny Lever|Arun Bakshi|Suhash Kulkarni|Guddi Maruti|Ashutosh Gowariker|Gavin Packard|Malay Chakrabarty|Avinash Kharshikar|Mushtaq Khan|Achyut Potdar|Ravi Patwardhan|Rajendra Mehra|Jaspal Sandhu|Rekha Pawar|Ajit Mehra|Mahesh Raj|Prem Lala|Prerna Singh|Sheetal|Shobha|Ali Asgar|Shreechand Makhija|Uday Srivastava|Snil Khope|Ram Murthy|Prakash Agarwal|Shahenshah|Narendra Goswami|Yusuf
title: Chamatkar
